title: Ivern ate my chat connectivity
body:
Bunch of threads about this already, but I figure one more = more notice.  Seems to be a widespread problem since the patch.

Damn you, Ivern.

replies.body:
Confirmed that Ivern has in fact tampered with our Chat service. Hang tight while we find Katarina to take him down.

Check [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZuTH9v2Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-05T23:19:22.191+0000)
>
> Confirmed that Ivern has in fact tampered with our Chat service. Hang tight while we find Katarina to take him down.
> 
> Check [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates.

I just completed a custom game and was able to manually reconnect afterwards.
